baseRule.text: 若比丘。共一比丘尼空靜處坐。波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 25

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 30

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer heimlich mit einer Nonne – er mit ihr alleine – zusammensitzt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk sits in private alone with a nun, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu se sienta en privado, solo con una bhikkhuni: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。共比丘尼。獨屏覆處坐。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 28

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與比丘尼。獨屏覆處坐。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 26

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻獨與一女人屏處坐者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 28

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。與比丘尼。式叉摩那沙彌尼。獨屏處坐。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 25

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！與比丘尼在屏處坐者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 26

translations.text: If a monk occupy a covered place, in company with a bhikṣuṇī, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu duduk di tempat terpencil dengan seorang bhikṣuṇī, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與比丘尼。在屏處坐者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 26

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。與比丘獨屏處共立共語。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 75

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。獨與一比丘屏處共立共語。波夜提(八十)。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 80

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼獨與苾芻在屏處立者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 82

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。與丈夫屏處坐者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 120
